title: Brunson jump-starts Knicks to help force Game 6
content: Jalen Brunson scored 14 of his 32 points in the opening quarter, as the Knicks finally got the start they wanted and rolled to a wire-to-wire 111-94 victory in Game 5.

title: 'No need to panic': Pacers flop but vow to respond
content: Tyrese Haliburton expressed confidence despite the Pacers falling flat in Thursday's Game 5 loss to the Knicks, saying, "We understand what the stakes are. ... We're fine."

title: Oilers win West, book Cup rematch vs. Panthers
content: Connor McDavid had a breakaway goal and an assist, Corey Perry scored again and the Oilers are going to their second Stanley Cup Final in a row after beating the Stars 6-3 on Thursday night in Game 5.

title: Stars' DeBoer defends call to pull Oettinger early
content: Jake Oettinger is one reason the Stars are in a championship window, yet his Game 5 performance Thursday night was instrumental in Dallas' third straight Western Conference finals exit.

title: CFP 5+11 model gaining traction among leaders
content: A 16-team College Football Playoff model featuring the top five conference champions and 11 at-large teams is gaining traction following SEC spring meetings this week.

title: Braves' Sale fastest to reach 2,500 career K's
content: Chris Sale's 2,500th strikeout came in his 2,026th inning, the fastest time frame in which a pitcher has reached that mark.

title: Vandersloot passes wife as top Sky scorer in win
content: Sky guard Courtney Vandersloot broke wife Allie Quigley's franchise record for points as the Chicago Sky beat the Wings for their first win of the season Thursday night.

title: Texas teen spells 'eclaircissement' to win title
content: Faizan Zaki went from runner-up last year to champion at the Scripps National Spelling Bee by outlasting eight other spellers to win the title on Thursday night.

title: üìà MLB Power Rankings: Another change at No. 1
content: Through the first two months of the 2025 season, five different teams have sat atop our list. Who won the battle in Week 9?

title: Which WNBA offseason moves are making the biggest impact -- and who still has work to do?
content: Kelsey Plum, Natasha Cloud and a Phoenix duo have made an immediate impact on their new WNBA teams in 2025.

title: Six tied for first-round lead at U.S. Women's Open
content: Angel Yin started experimenting with a new putter about a month ago and decided to use it in a tournament for the first time at the most prestigious event in women's golf.

title: 16 NFC teams, 16 offseason awards: The good -- and most confusing -- additions
content: Green Bay has a wide receiver logjam. Washington loaded up on veterans. And San Francisco isn't quite ready to rebuild.

title: Bengals' Trey Hendrickson is 'extremely dug in' over contract dispute; here's what to know
content: Hendrickson said he won't play without a new contract, and mandatory minicamp is nearing. Will something give?

title: Why two top MLB prospects are still in the minors despite huge numbers
content: Roman Anthony and Jac Caglianone are tearing up the minors while the Red Sox and Royals are scuffling. What gives?

title: No Morgan, no Rapinoe: The USWNT doesn't have a face of the team now. Is that OK?
content: Since Alex Morgan retired, the USWNT has lacked a star leader. Is Trinity Rodman due for that role? Naomi Girma or someone else?

title: Sources: Chelsea to beat Man Utd to Delap signing
content: Chelsea have beaten Manchester United to the ¬£30 million signing of Liam Delap with sources telling ESPN, with a deal close to being finalised.

title: Milan fire Concei√ß√£o, reportedly line up Allegri
content: AC Milan fired Sergio Conceicao as expected on Thursday following a disappointing season that saw the Rossoneri fail to qualify for Europe.

title: Sources: Spirit coach Gir√°ldez close to Lyonnes job
content: Washington Spirit head coach Jonatan Gir√°ldez is in advanced discussions to take over as head coach of French powerhouse OL Lyonnes, multiple sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Man charged after Liverpool parade incident
content: A man has been charged after a car drove into a crowd of pedestrians following Liverpool's Premier League victory parade on Monday.

title: Di Mar√≠a to return to boyhood club Rosario Central
content: Argentina forward √Ångel Di Mar√≠a will return to his homeland to play for his boyhood club Rosario Central, the Argentine Primera Division club announced on Thursday.

title: Mistrial declared in case over Maradona's death
content: An Argentine court has declared a mistrial in the case of seven health professionals accused of negligence in the death of soccer legend Diego Maradona.

title: Man Utd's Amad: No regrets over obscene gesture
content: Manchester United winger Amad Diallo has said he held up his middle finger to the crowd outside the team's hotel in Kuala Lumpur after insults were allegedly made about his mother.

title: Louisville's Fischer gets 3-match ban for hair pull
content: Racing Louisville FC forward Kayla Fischer will serve a three-game suspension for a hair-pulling incident, sources told ESPN.

title: Delayed flights, missed meals and little sleep: How college teams adjusted to cross-country travel
content: How Oregon State baseball and multiple teams at UCLA adapted to new schedules, for better and for worse.

title: How the Oilers, Panthers got back to the Stanley Cup Final
content: From the first round all the way through the Stanley Cup Final, ESPN has you covered this NHL postseason.

title: NBA draft withdrawal deadline: NIL's impact, Florida's gain, the 2026 draft, more
content: Who are biggest winners and losers from prospects' decisions to stay or go? We answer the burning questions.

title: 2025 MLB mock draft 1.0: High school slugger or college ace at No. 1?
content: Starting with a wide-open top of the board, here's how the first round of this July's draft could play out.

title: How PSG moved on from Mbapp√©, Messi and Neymar -- but got better
content: Paris Saint-Germain once had all the game's biggest stars, but always fell short of Champions League glory. In 2025, with a team of young talent and no major egos, they're poised to finally break through.

title: Transfer window preview: What do Europe's big clubs need?
content: The first transfer window is set to open across Europe on June 1, so what are the top clubs planning? Who comes in? Who will go?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool duo wanted by Saudi clubs
content: Saudi Pro League clubs are showing interest in Darwin Nunez and Luis Diaz. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Ohtani scores 170 runs? Royals have a top-10 starting pitcher? Don't be surprised
content: Eric Karabell looks into the crystal ball to tell fantasy baseball managers what might come to pass in the not-too-distant future.

title: Teen Working At Burger King In Graduation Uniform Gets Rs 68 Lakh Donation
content: A Georgia youngster received nearly $80,000, approximately Rs 68,25,360, in donations after attending his Burger King work shift in his graduation ceremony attire.

title: India Has 'Evidence' To Put Pakistan Back On Money Laundering Grey List: Sources
content: According to sources, Pakistan spends about 18 per cent of its budget on defence services - higher than what conflict-ridden countries spend (10 to 14 per cent).

title: What Chirag Paswan Told NDTV On Posters Showing Him As Next Bihar Chief Minister
content: In an interview with NDTV, Union Minister Chirag was also asked about his repeated statement that "Bihar is calling me".

title: "Good Amount Of Grind, Grit Must": Women Cadets On NDA Journey
content: 17 women cadets graduated from National Defence Academy, alongside over 300 male counterparts, marking the passing out of its first co-ed batch.

title: Microsoft Chief Product Officer's Message For Coders After Laying Off 6,000 Employees
content: Aparna Chennapragada said learning to code has become more valuable than ever, even though the way we code is changing with time.

title: Name Mix-Up Leads To Release Of Rape Accused Instead Of Prisoner Granted Bail
content: The district jail administration released a POCSO prisoner instead of the prisoner who was supposed to be released on bail due to a mix-up of names, police said on Friday.

title: Uttarakhand Resort Owner, 2 Others Convicted For Murder Of Receptionist Ankita Bhandari
content: Pulkit Arya, the owner of the Vanantara resort near Rishikesh, and two of his employees were convicted of the murder of Ankita Bhandari, who was found dead in 2022.

title: "Can't Get Food For My Children": Chaos At Food Distribution Sites In Gaza
content: Chaos erupted again Thursday as tens of thousands of desperate Palestinians in the Gaza Strip tried to collect food from distribution sites run by a new US- and Israeli-backed foundation.

title: US Border Officials Arrest Illegal Indian Immigrant On Child Predator Charges
content: Border authorities have arrested an Indian citizen living illegally in the US wanted for child predator charges.

title: Explained: How Officials Are Planning To Hold Amarnath Yatra, 1st After J&K Attack
content: The 38-day pilgrimage to the 3,880-meter-high cave shrine in Kashmir will start on July 3 and end on August 9, the Shri Amarnath Shrine Board (SASB) said.

title: Influencers To Legislatures, Brazil's 'Reborn' Dolls Craze Spares None
content: Videos featuring emotional moments with hyper-realistic baby dolls have sparked both online fascination and political debate in Brazil, with lawmakers even bringing the lifelike dolls into legislatures.

title: Indian-American Faizan Zaki Wins National Spelling Bee In US
content: After last year's bee had little drama before an abrupt move to the spell-off, Scripps tweaked the competition rules, giving judges more leeway to let the competition play out before going to the tiebreaker. The nine finalists delivered.

title: PM Modi To Inaugurate Rs 47,573 Crore Several Projects In Kanpur Today
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be inaugurating and laying the foundation stone for 15 mega development projects worth over Rs 47,573 crore here on Friday.

title: PM Modi To Meet Family Of Pahalgam Terror Attack Victims In Kanpur
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will meet the family of Pahalgam terror attack victim Shubham Dwivedi at Chakeri airport here on Friday, an official said.

title: Three New Supreme Court Judges Take Oath
content: Three High Court judges -- Justice NV Anjaria, Justice Vijay Bishnoi, and Justice AS Chandurkar- took oath on Friday as the judges of the Supreme Court.

title: SEBI Bans Actor Arshad Warsi, 58 Others From Securities Markets For Up To 5 Years
content: Markets regulator Sebi has barred Bollywood actor Arshad Warsi, his wife Maria Goretti, and 57 other entities from the securities markets for 1-5 years in a case related to misleading videos on YouTube channels.

title: Rs 2 Crore Found In Raids On Odisha Engineer, He Throws Cash From Window
content: It was raining cash in Odisha's Bhubaneswar as over Rs 2 crore were found at a government engineer's premises.

title: "Just Kill That Woman": Old Video Of Covid Patient's Treatment Surfaces
content: Police have registered an FIR against a doctor of a government hospital in Maharashtra for allegedly instructing a colleague to "kill" a Covid patient during the 2021 pandemic.

title: Opinion: Blog | 30 Terrifying Minutes On A Delhi-Srinagar Flight That Changed My Life - By Derek O'Brien
content: We see lightning, clearly visible as it stabs through daylight. Now there is some turbulence, but it progresses rapidly. I realise this is not your regular turbulence. This is severe, the likes I've never experienced on my frequent flyer miles before

title: White House Says 'Errors' In RFK Jr's 'Make America Healthy Again' Report
content: RFK Jr's wide-ranging "Make America Healthy Again" report cited hundreds of studies, but a closer look found that some of those studies did not actually exist.

title: Rankings: Napheesa Collier jumps Caitlin Clark
content: Fantasy women's basketball rankings for 2025 with A'ja Wilson, Napheesa Collier and Caitlin Clark as the top three.

title: Expert picks and best bets: Can Barber extend her win streak vs. Blanchfield?
content: Retired MMA fighters Din Thomas and Anthony Smith make their predictions for the main event of the upcoming UFC Fight Night.

title: EA Sports College Football 26 gameplay officially revealed in new trailer
content: The latest entry in the revived series will include thousands of real college players and over 300 real-world coaches.

title: 'Right of self-defence': Tharoor 'disappointed' over Colombia's reaction to Op Sindoor
content: Shashi Tharoor expressed disappointment over Colombia's condolences for lives lost in Pakistan after India's counterstrike, emphasizing India's right to self-defense following the Pahalgam attack. He highlighted the lack of action from Pakistan against terrorists and presented evidence of Pakistani military officials attending terrorist funerals, underscoring Pakistan's complicity in supporting terrorism.

title: Watch: Chief engineer throws bundles of Rs 500 notes from flat during raid
content: Odisha Vigilance Department recovered approximately Rs 2.1 crore in cash during raids at seven locations connected to Baikuntha Nath Sarangi, chief engineer in the state‚Äôs Rural Development Department, following allegations of disproportionate assets. Sarangi allegedly attempted to dispose of bundles of Rs 500 notes from his Bhubaneswar flat as vigilance officers arrived.

title: 'Returned to Bihar after fulfilling promise made here': PM Modi - top quotes
content: Prime Minister Modi, addressing a rally in Bihar, asserted that he fulfilled his promise to retaliate against Pakistan following the Pahalgam attack, referencing Operation Sindoor. He highlighted the destruction of terror launchpads and Pakistani airbases. Modi also credited Nitish Kumar for Bihar's progress, contrasting it with the previous 'Jungle Raj' era, and noted the reduction of Naxal-affected districts.

title: 'How many Rafale jets did we lose?': Telangana CM Revanth Reddy questions
content: Chief Minister Revanth Reddy has strongly criticized the BJP-led NDA government's handling of Operation Sindoor, questioning the sudden ceasefire with Pakistan and lack of transparency. Addressing a rally honoring the armed forces, Reddy accused the Centre of a unilateral approach and demanded clarity on the operation's impact.

title: Sebi bans Arshad Warsi, wife & 57 others for up to 5 yrs in Sadhna Broadcast case
content: Sebi has penalized Arshad Warsi, Maria Goretti, and 57 others for securities market manipulation related to Sadhna Broadcast shares. They are barred from the market for up to five years and face significant fines.

title: Microsoft CEO to employees in Town Hall: 6000 job cuts were related to‚Ä¶
content: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella attributed recent layoffs to reorganization rather than performance, impacting even product development roles. The company is aggressively pushing its Copilot AI assistants, securing a significant deal with Barclays for 100,000 licenses. While adoption is growing, some clients are proceeding cautiously, awaiting clearer returns on Microsoft's AI investments.

title: What happens if GT vs MI IPL Eliminator gets washed out today?
content: The IPL 2025 Eliminator between Gujarat Titans and Mumbai Indians in Mullanpur faces rain concerns. While forecasts vary, the possibility of showers looms. A washout would see Gujarat advance to Qualifier 2 due to their higher league standing, eliminating Mumbai.

title: Can dietary supplement provide first effective treatment for liver cirrhosis?
content: Liver disease, a major global health concern, leads to millions of deaths annually due to complications like cirrhosis and liver cancer. Excitingly, a new study is exploring the potential of the dietary supplement HMB to treat cirrhosis, a condition affecting thousands in the UK.

title: A new kid in our solar system? Hunt for mysterious 'Planet Nine' offers a surprise
content: Scientists hunting for the hypothetical Planet Nine have discovered a potential new dwarf planet, 2017 OF201, in the outer solar system. This object, roughly 700km across, boasts an extremely elongated 25,000-year orbit that takes it far into the Oort cloud.

title: LinkedIn lays off hundreds of employees across California
content: LinkedIn has recently laid off 281 employees in California, impacting engineers and other roles across multiple locations, according to a WARN document. These job cuts are part of a larger trend at parent company Microsoft, which has also seen recent layoffs. The reasons behind the reductions remain unclear, as neither LinkedIn nor Microsoft have commented on the situation.

title: Caribbean island gripped by fear after boat with 11 decomposed bodies washes ashore
content: Authorities in St. Vincent and the Grenadines are investigating after a vessel carrying the decomposed remains of at least 11 people washed ashore on Canouan. Passports found on the 45-foot boat suggest a possible link to Mali, West Africa. The investigation is ongoing, with authorities collaborating with international partners to determine the origin of the vessel and the cause of death, amid concerns about the crisis in Mali.

title: 'Will not tolerate China's exploitation of universities': US
content: The United States has declared its firm stance against China's exploitation of American universities and the theft of intellectual property. The Trump administration is prioritizing national security by rigorously vetting visa applicants to prevent individuals who pose a threat from entering the country. These measures aim to safeguard US research, technology, and national security interests.

title: IPL Eliminator match today, GT vs MI: All you need to know
content: Gujarat Titans and Mumbai Indians are set for a crucial IPL 2025 Eliminator in Mullanpur, both facing challenges with key player absences and inconsistent form. Shubman Gill and Hardik Pandya aim to lead their teams to victory, navigating batting concerns and leveraging strong bowling lineups. The match will be influenced by Mullanpur's pitch conditions and potential weather disruptions.

title: Microsoft exec has a message for coders, after it laid off over 2k software engineers
content: Despite recent layoffs impacting software engineers, Microsoft's CPO, Aparna Chennapragada, defends the importance of computer science education. She argues AI is simply another layer of abstraction, transforming roles into "software operators" rather than eliminating them. As Microsoft invests heavily in AI, project managers will also adapt, focusing on editing and refining AI-generated ideas.

title: 'MIT wants a free Palestine': Indian-American student on Israel 'genocide' in speech
content: During MIT's commencement, Class of 2025 president Megha Vemuri delivered a pro-Palestinian speech, criticizing the university's connections to Israel and urging graduates to take action. Wearing a keffiyeh, she highlighted MIT's research ties with the Israeli military and the destruction of Gaza's educational infrastructure. Vemuri called on graduates to oppose MIT's complicity in what she termed the "ongoing genocide of the Palestinian people."

title: Jodha-Akbar marriage untrue, emperor married Amer palace maid: Rajasthan governor
content: Governor Haribhau Bagde sparked controversy by asserting that Mughal Emperor Akbar married a maid, not a princess from Amer, contradicting historical accounts. He accused British historians of distorting Indian history to diminish native heroes, citing the absence of 'Jodha Bai' in Akbarnama.

title: ‚ÄòBetter to take 25% tariff hit‚Ä¶‚Äô: Apple exports 2.9m iPhones from India despite Trump‚Äôs pressure
content: Despite Trump's call to shift production, Apple significantly increased iPhone exports from India to the US, marking a 76% surge in April. This move aligns with Apple's diversification strategy amid declining Chinese exports.

title: 'Kamal Haasan is like father, but Kannada needs more than words': Shiva Rajkumar
content: Kannada actor Shiva Rajkumar addressed the controversy surrounding Kamal Haasan's remarks about the origin of Kannada. While acknowledging Haasan as an idol and praising his respect for Kannada and Bengaluru, Shiva Rajkumar emphasized that love for the language should be consistent and demonstrated through long-term commitment, urging everyone to reflect on their contributions to Kannada language and cinema.

title: 'PoK must be given back to India': Salman Khurshid backs Centre's move on Article 370
content: Congress veteran Salman Khurshid, as part of an all-party delegation, lauded the government's decision on Article 370 and the military's response to the Pahalgam attack. He emphasized India's claim to PoK and the necessity of Pakistan ceasing terror activities for any dialogue, including regarding the Indus Waters Treaty. Khurshid also highlighted Indonesia's support for India's stance against Pakistan's narrative.

title: 2 dead, 3 critical after drunk Delhi teen rams speeding car into bicycle, shanty
content: In a tragic incident in Delhi's Janakpuri, a 19-year-old driver, allegedly intoxicated, fatally struck two men and severely injured three others, including a pregnant woman and a child. The accused, Harsh, lost control of his car while returning from a party in Gurgaon, first hitting a bicycle and then crashing into a roadside shanty.

title: CBSE allows class 10th Basic Math students to opt for Standard Math in class 11th
content: CBSE now permits students with Basic Mathematics in Class 10 to opt for Standard Mathematics in Class 11 for the 2025-26 session. This continues a relaxation started during COVID-19. The decision allows greater academic flexibility, especially for those now wanting a stronger math foundation. Principals must ensure students have the aptitude. Once subjects are finalized, no changes are allowed.

title: Bomb threat causes panic at Jaipur family court; premises evacuated
content: A bomb threat led to the evacuation of the Jaipur Family Court on Friday, triggering a rapid response from local police. Authorities promptly evacuated the building as a precautionary measure, ensuring the safety of all individuals present.

title: Watch: Rhino tries to overturn tourist jeep in Assam - video goes viral
content: A shocking video from Assam's Manas National Park shows a wild rhino aggressively attacking a tourist jeep in the Salbari Range. The rhino repeatedly attempted to overturn the vehicle, causing panic among the tourists. Fortunately, no injuries were reported. Experts suggest that monsoon flooding forces rhinos out of their habitat, increasing the risk of human-wildlife conflict.

title: Who is Anushka's friend in RCB's Qualifier 1 win? Internet wants to know
content: Anushka Sharma's presence at RCB's IPL 2025 Qualifier 1 victory grabbed attention, but the mystery companion beside her sparked online curiosity. The woman is Malvika Nayak, a close friend of Anushka and Business Development head at Innoz Technologies. Malvika's husband, Nikhil Sosale, heads Marketing & Revenue for RCB, solidifying their connection to the team and the celebrity couple.

title: Shake-up at ICE: Top officials step down amid push for more deportations
content: Amid pressure from the Trump administration to increase deportations, ICE is undergoing another leadership shake-up, with several senior officials stepping down or being reassigned. This follows the administration's ambitious goal of 3,000 daily arrests, a significant increase from current rates. Despite internal uncertainty, ICE leadership is urging staff to stay focused on fulfilling their mandate.

title: ‚ÄòEven if we lose‚Ä¶‚Äô: Trump admin readying new strategy to impose tariffs
content: The Donald Trump administration is considering alternative strategies after a court ruling blocked its reciprocal tariffs. Officials are exploring broad-based tariffs under the Trade Act of 1974, allowing levies up to 15% for 150 days. This interim measure would provide time to develop country-specific tariffs, signaling a continued push for trade advantages despite legal challenges.

title: NBA star Klay Thompson suffers devastating loss as his dog Rocco passes away at 13
content: NBA star Klay Thompson is mourning the loss of his beloved English bulldog, Rocco, who passed away at the age of 13. Rocco had been with Thompson since his rookie season in 2011, becoming a constant companion throughout his NBA journey. Thompson's father, Mychal, shared the news, highlighting Rocco's significant role in their lives.

title: ‚ÄòI know electrocution impact‚Äô: MP professor contests husband's autopsy report in HC
content: Mamta Pathak, a 60-year-old chemistry professor convicted of her husband's murder and sentenced to 20 years, is challenging the autopsy report in court. She argues that as a chemistry expert, she understands the effects of electrocution on the body and questions the differentiation between electric and thermal burn marks without chemical analysis.

title: After Harvard ban and US visa curb, these top Japanese universities step in: Is Asia the future of global education?
content: In May 2025, the U.S. government revoked Harvard's international student certification, impacting thousands. Japan's Education Ministry has encouraged its universities to admit displaced students, with the University of Tokyo and Kyoto University considering temporary acceptance and support measures. This action highlights Asia's growing appeal as a study abroad destination amid changing global education landscapes.

title: 'Musk will always be with us': Trump on 'terrific' Elon's last day, joint press conf later
content: US President Donald Trump on Thursday announced a joint press conference at the White House‚Äôs Oval Office for 11 pm (IST) on Friday after Elon Musk stepped down from his role as a special government employee.

title: Virat Kohli: The force behind RCB's dominant march to IPL 2025 final
content: Virat Kohli‚Äôs passion and intensity were on full display as he led RCB to the IPL 2025 final. He is no longer the captain but remains the emotional core of the team, driving them forward with relentless energy. With one match to go, fans wonder: will this be the year Kohli finally lifts the IPL trophy he‚Äôs longed for?

title: Emotional Virat Kohli hugs teammates, signals 'one more to go!' ‚Äì Watch
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru secured a dominant eight-wicket victory over Punjab Kings in Qualifier 1, propelling them to their fourth IPL final. Virat Kohli's emotional "one more to go!" message resonated as RCB chased down 102 in 10 overs. They are now one win away from their first IPL title, with Phil Salt's unbeaten 56 leading the charge.

title: Gold price prediction: What's gold rate outlook for May 30 - should you buy or sell?
content: Gold price prediction today: MCX Gold is anticipated to be lower due to overnight COMEX weakness, presenting a sell-on-rise opportunity. Analysts suggest monitoring the ‚Çπ96350-96400 resistance zone for potential short entries, with a stop loss at ‚Çπ96550. Traders should watch dollar strength, rising Treasury yields, and geopolitical events for risk management.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 flat in opening trade; BSE Sensex dips 100 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened flat in trade on Friday. While Nifty50 was near 24,850, BSE Sensex was down around 100 points in opening trade.

title: Bengaluru road rage: Motorist bites bizman‚Äôs finger after car splashes rainwater, flees
content: In Bengaluru, a road rage incident led to severe injury for a businessman after his car unintentionally splashed rainwater on another vehicle. The enraged driver of the other car attacked Jayant Shekhar, biting his finger so severely that it required surgery. Police are now searching for the assailant and his female companion, who also threatened the victim and his family.

title: Why Josh Hazlewood is crucial in RCB‚Äôs quest for their maiden IPL title
content: Josh Hazlewood has emerged as a key weapon in RCB‚Äôs title charge. With 21 wickets in 11 games, his evolution into a T20 specialist reflects experience, adaptability, and control. Back from injury and peaking at the right time, Hazlewood is the crucial piece in RCB‚Äôs quest for their maiden IPL title.

title: Netflix goes down, viewers panic, and the memes take over
content: Netflix experienced a widespread outage, frustrating users across the U.S., Canada, and Asia during peak viewing hours. The error, often linked to cached data issues, prompted a flurry of social media activity as viewers struggled to access their favorite shows. While Netflix remained silent, users turned to humor, creating memes and sharing their experiences on platforms like Twitter/X.

title: Expect thunderstorms, strong winds in Delhi-NCR today; orange alert issued
content: Delhi experienced a slight temperature increase, followed by an overcast sky, gusty winds, and brief rainfall in several areas, offering some relief. The Met Department has issued an orange alert for Friday, forecasting light to moderate rainfall with thunderstorms due to a western disturbance affecting northwest India. Officials advise against mountain travel due to potential severe weather.

title: ‚ÄòI‚Äôll make you a star‚Äô: Bengaluru dance teacher arrested for sexually harassing teen in car
content: Bharathi Kannan, a 32-year-old dance master, was arrested for allegedly harassing a 17-year-old girl in Bengaluru. He approached her near a bank, promising to make her a celebrity dancer and convinced her to get into his car. Kannan then sexually harassed her during the drive, leading to her desperate attempts to escape and his subsequent arrest under the Pocso Act.

title: Viral: World's lowest ‚Äòbanana peel‚Äô car has people scratching their heads
content: Taiwan's automotive scene has birthed the 'Banana Peel,' an ultra-low Honda Civic modification that's turning heads globally. This creation by Stance Garage Taiwan sits millimeters from the ground, achieved through extensive suspension and bodywork alterations. The driver navigates lying down, using cameras.

title: IPL: Mohali high in spirits as Gill returns home after becoming Test captain
content: On Friday, Shubman Gill's Gujarat Titans (GT) will take on Hardik Pandya's Mumbai Indians (MI) in the Eliminator at Punjab cricket's new home, the New PCA Stadium in Mullanpur. It will also be the first time Shubman Gill will play at home after becoming India's Test captain. He has led GT from the front, and winning the IPL will give him the right momentum ahead of the marathon he is expected to have in whites for India.

title: Osmania univ declares April- May UG results for B.Sc, BBA, BA, and B.Com programmes
content: Osmania University has declared the April/May 2025 examination results for various undergraduate courses, including B.Sc (Hons), B.Sc (CBCS), BBA, BA, and B.Com (CBCS). The results are available on the official university portal. The institution, recently accredited with an 'A' grade by NAAC, continues to maintain high academic standards. The Vice-Chancellor congratulated the successful students and encouraged others to improve. These results mark an important milestone in the academic careers of thousands of students.

title: Day after being struck down, US appeals court allows Trump tariffs to stay in effect
content: Donald Trump received temporary approval to continue collecting tariffs under emergency powers, following a federal trade court ruling that deemed his sweeping levies on foreign imports unlawful. The US Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit has paused the trade court's decision while the White House appeals.

title: WBSSC issues notice for recruitment of over 35,726 teachers in Bengal
content: In a significant clause, the notice stipulated the age limit from 21 years-40 years; the online applications will be received from June 16, 5 p.m. till June 17, 5 p.m.

title: Over ‚Çπ2 crore in cash, assets 'disproportionate' to Odisha govt engineer's income recovered
content: Around ‚Çπ1 crore in cash was recovered from his Bhubaneswar flat, and ‚Çπ1.1 crore was found at Sarangi‚Äôs residence at Angul

title: Operation Sindoor is not just a military action but India‚Äôs frontal assault against terrorism, says Rajnath
content: ‚ÄúOur strike was so powerful that Pakistan began pleading with entire world to stop India‚Äù, said Rajnath Singh on Operation Sindoor.

title: A new crown awaits: Miss World 2025 to conclude with glittering finale in Hyderabad
content: The grand finale promises glamour and purpose, combining dazzling performances, inspiring stories, and a fierce competition for the coveted Miss World crown

title: Awareness campaign on tribal welfare schemes to be held in Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs Palnadu district from June 15
content: The District Collector P. Arun Babu told The Hindu that these awareness camps would enhance the living standards of the PVTGs in the district, so that they could easily access all the welfare schemes benefits

title: Consumers seek permanent Tangedco building near Katpadi
content: Officials say that repeated requests have been made to higher officials to relocate the existing office to a new permanent building

title: Awadh‚Äôs¬†last mirasins¬†struggle to keep their musical heritage alive
content: With more people opting for film music at weddings, these women singers may be the last custodians of their community

title: Theatre frees you, says actor Kishore Kumar on his return to stage after two decades¬†
content: Kannada actor Kishore Kumar talks about his journey in Indian cinema and his love for the medium of theatre

title: CRPF DG reviews security for Amarnath Yatra
content: The 38-day pilgrimage to the 3,880-meter-high Amarnath cave shrine in south Kashmir is scheduled to start on July 3 and conclude on August 9, according to the announcement made by the Shri Amarnath Shrine Board

title: One dead, two injured, eight missing as tourist vehicle plunges into Teesta river in north Sikkim
content: Rescue efforts are going on as teams attempt to reach the crash site and trace the vehicle in the deep gorge

title: Man arrested for threatening to kill PM Modi during his Bihar visit
content: ‚ÄúPrima facie, it appears that the accused made the WhatsApp call from Mantu Chaudhary‚Äôs mobile number by using a virtual private network to put him in trouble as they have a property dispute,‚Äù the police statement said

title: TVK chief Vijay urges voters to back honest, corruption-free candidates, reject cash-for-vote offers
content: Speaking at an event held in Poonjeri near Mahabalipuram to felicitate students who excelled in Classes 10 and 12 exams, Mr. Vijay said, ‚ÄúThe National Eligibility-cum-Entrance Test (NEET) is not the end of the world.‚Äù

title: Kerala Nipah patient virus-free, health improving, says Minister Veena George
content: Minister says although critical stage of the illness has not yet been fully overcome, the patient's health indicators are steadily improving

title: India important supporter of peacekeeping: UN peacekeeping chief Lacroix
content: UN‚Äôs Jean-Pierre Lacroix said India is a key peacekeeping contributor, supporting troops, peace efforts, and accountability for crimes against peacekeepers

title: CBI arrests ED deputy director in Odisha on charges of bribery
content: According to the CBI arrests, ED officer Chintan Raghuvanshi allegedly demanded ‚Çπ5 crore from businessman Ratikanta Rout, who has a stone mining business in Dhenkanal, for giving him ‚Äúrelief‚Äù in an ED case registered against him.

title: CM Stalin orders establishment of four more arts and science colleges in Tamil Nadu
content: On May 26, Mr. Stalin, via video conference from the Secretariat in Chennai, inaugurated new State-run arts and science colleges at 11 locations

title: Southwest monsoon rainfall continues to lash Kerala
content: Three districts ‚Äì Kasaragod, Kannur and Idukki ‚Äì are on red alert, while the 11 remaining districts are on orange alert

title: Justices Anjaria, Vijay Bishnoi, Chandurkar take oath as SC judges
content: Justices Anjaria, Bishnoi and Chandurkar were welcomed with warm handshakes by Chief Justice Gavai after they were read their oath of office

title: Heavy rains batter Kerala overnight, cause widespread havoc and power outages
content: IMD says severe weather set to continue with low-pressure area over Bay of Bengal intensifying.¬†It has issued a red alert for Idukki, Kannur and Kasaragod districts

title: First batch of 17 women cadets graduates from NDA alongside over 300 male peers
content: ‚ÄúThese young women are the inevitable symbol of ‚ÄúNaari Shakti‚Äù, embodying not just women‚Äôs development but women-led development,‚Äù Gen. V.K. Singh said

title: IRCTC case: Court reserves order on framing of charges against Lalu Prasad, Rabri Devi, Tejashwi
content: The charges include criminal conspiracy, cheating and corruption that carry a maximum jail term of seven years.

title: PM Modi to inaugurate, lay foundation stone of development projects worth ‚Çπ48,520 crore in Bihar
content: The Prime Minister, who arrived in Patna on a two-day visit to the State on Thursday (May 29, 2025), will also address a public rally in Karakat.

title: 5 killed, several injured in firecracker factory blast in Punjab's Sri Muktsar Sahib
content: The blast occurred in one of the rooms in the manufacturing setup of the unit, leading to collapse of the roof.

title: In images: Landlips, tree-falls as torrential rains lash Coastal Karnataka
content: Some areas in Mangaluru city, like Jeppinamogaru, Rao and Rao Circle, Mission Street and Kopparahitlu, were flooded and there were reports of trees falling.

title: Shashi Tharoor ‚Äòdisappointed‚Äô that Colombia expressed sympathies with Pakistan during Operation Sindoor
content: The Congress MP, who is leading a multiparty delegation to Colombia, stated on Thursday (May 29, 2025) that India was only exercising its right to self-defence.

title: Maharashtra received 40 percent of the country‚Äôs FDI, says Fadnavis
content: Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis claimed that in the financial year 2024-25, Maharashtra witnessed a record foreign direct investment and 40 percent of the total investment in the country this year has been made in Maharashtra alone.¬†¬†

title: Karnataka rain: Two die in landslips in Dakshina Kannada as heavy rains lash coastal belt
content: Some areas in Mangaluru city, like Jeppinamogaru, Rao and Rao Circle, Mission Street and Kopparahitlu, were flooded and there were reports of trees falling

title: The modern short story in a regional language and the function of translations
content: Translators of three recent anthologies in The Early Classic Stories Series by HarperCollins discuss challenges and technique

title: 'Spent 90 days in Pakistan, met ISI officials': Delhi Police arrests Rajasthan man for espionage
content: Using social media on these Indian SIMs, PIOs contacted Indians to extract classified information pertaining to sensitive installations and departments

title: Model zero-cost MRFs in Dakshina Kannada process dry waste generated by 223 gram panchayats
content: As part of Swachh Bharath Mission, the Central government mooted the setting up of a material recovery facility with the capacity of handling 10 tonnes of waste per day in a few places, including in Dakshina Kannada

title: Jayalakshmi Vilas Mansion: Where the traditions of the Deccan come alive¬†
content: The restoration of Jayalakshmi Vilas Mansion in Mysuru is being led by the Deccan Heritage Foundation India and supported by the Harish and Bina Shah Foundation and the U.S. Ambassador‚Äôs Fund for Cultural Preservation

title: On Andhra‚Äôs verdant hills, diseases hunt
content: As monsoon clouds gather over the picturesque hills of ASR district, tribespeople cross their fingers, for in their hamlets, where even paracetamol is hard to come by, seasonal illnesses can kill. B Madhu Gopal finds out how systemic problems turn an entire people into easy prey for ailments long conquered in other parts of the State

title: Autonomous warfare in Operation Sindoor
content: In the recent India-Pakistan war, over four days of hostilities, both sides effectively rewrote their rules of engagement, ushering in a ‚Äònew normal‚Äô of airborne deterrence without pilots, but with autonomous platforms, armed drones and loitering munitions

title: Rains LIVE: Heavy rain causes power outages in Kerala; life partially affected due to rain¬†in¬†northeast
content: Kasaragod, Kannur and Idukki are on red alert for extremely heavy rainfall; 11 remaining districts, including the capital Thiruvananthapuram, are on orange alert for isolated heavy to very heavy rainfall

title: Ration distribution to begin from June 1 across State: Minister
content: Fair price shops will remain open every day, including Sundays, from June 1 to 15; if market prices rise, we will supply essential items at subsidised rates through these shops, says Mr. Manohar

title: Hyderabad¬†Gulzar Houz fire tragedy: Smoke, sorrow and a system on fire
content: Two weeks ago, a fierce blaze tore through a century-old Hyderabad home near Charminar, claiming 17 of a family, including eight children. Even as grieving relatives point the finger at a slow, ill-equipped emergency response, the tragedy has also exposed how aging neighbourhoods with cramped homes, blocked exits and faulty wiring can turn a single short circuit into a catastrophe.¬†Naveen Kumar¬†and¬†Lavpreet Kaur¬†uncover the gaps in safety and emergency readiness

title: India virtually rejects Washington's claim of offering trade to halt Indo-Pak conflict
content: India has been consistently maintaining that the understanding on cessation of hostilities with Pakistan was reached following direct talks between the Directors General of Military Operations (DGMOs) of the two militaries

title: Taking baby steps to regulate pre-schools in Karnataka
content: The Department of School Education and Literacy in Karnataka, earlier this week, issued an order making registration mandatory for all newly started pre-schools. But stakeholders say tell Jayanth R. that more needs to be done to regulate pre-schools in the interest of children‚Äôs education and safety

title: 76 new COVID-19 cases come to light in Maharashtra
content: There are 425 active patients at present while 165 patients have recovered. Seven patients have died since January, of which six were suffering from co-morbidities

title: No need for concern over COVID cases, says Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan
content: State has 727 active cases and govt. has put in place requisite testing and trearment facilities, says Pinarayi

title: Delimitation: 129 new wards in grama panchayats in Ernakulam
content: A total of 1,990 wards have been formed in the district across 82 grama panchayats, 13 municipalities, and the Kochi Corporation. Of them, 147 are new wards

title: Pakistan only a cradle of terrorism, has nothing good to offer: Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that Pakistan should understand that we have entered their house and hit them three times

title: West Bengal‚Äôs role is critical to vision of a developed India, says PM
content: The PM said the City Gas Distribution network was an example of doorstep delivery  of schemes; clean and affordable energy will be supplied to households via a pipeline

title: Aspirational Nuh district in Haryana, abandoned education
content: Haryana‚Äôs Nuh district ranks the lowest in the State board examination results, which were released earlier in May. With a 45% dropout rate after Class 10, officials blame cheating, teachers cite staff shortage, and parents question the value of education amid poor employment opportunities in the State, Samridhi Tewari reports

title: BSF fortifies village guards initiative with arms training for Jammu border residents
content: In one of the largest deployments in recent times, more than 52,000 Central forces to be posted for Amarnath Yatra security; this is likely the first time the BSF has been engaged to provide training to village defence guards; earlier provided with .303 rifles, the guards are being provided with semi-automatic guns

title: AIADMK duty-bound to allot Rajya Sabha seat to DMDK: Premallatha Vijayakant
content: The AIADMK should keep its word and prove its trustworthiness to the people and party cadre, she says

title: The case for a special fiscal package for Andhra Pradesh
content: It is for the Finance Commission to come up with an apolitical and formula-based solution so that States that have lost fiscal capacity are not abandoned

title: ED official arrested for accepting ‚Çπ20 lakh bribe in Bhubaneswar
content: The Deputy Director-level officer had reportedly struck a ‚Çπ50 lakh deal with a Bhubaneswar-based mine operator

title: National Highway 66 at Malappuram: A hype comes crashing down
content: The collapse of the newly built National Highway 66 at Malappuram and the deep fissures that were developed on the road stretches in Thrissur, Kozhikode and Kannur districts have caught the State and the Union governments off guard. As questions are being raised about public safety and the technical feasibility of the ambitious road projects in the State, Abdul Latheef Naha hits the road to weigh up the situation

title: Courts cannot remain mute spectators, Karnataka HC says in order to ban Proton Mail over digital sexual abuse
content: One month after pronouncing order, HC releases full judgement; Swiss-based encrypted mail platform still accessible in India; Proton had refused to help lawyers identify users who sent obscene emails to a woman

title: 4 kgs ganja seized, seven peddlers arrested
content: With ongoing investigations, more arrests are likely to take place, says Krishna district Superintendent of Police R. Gangadhar Rao

title: New rail lines in M.P. will boost freight movement and tourism, says Railways Minister
content: ‚Çπ1,018 crore project to ease congestion on high-density route; new trains and station upgrades announced for Madhya Pradesh

title: Two marsh crocodiles born in Thiruvananthapuram zoo
content: Zoo veterinary surgeon Nikesh Kiran examined the newborn muggers and shifted them to a specially created pond.

title: Election Commission‚Äôs one-point dashboard to become operational before Bihar election
content: Named ‚ÄòECINET‚Äô, it is aimed at providing all services for stakeholders at a single point, instead of the over 40 apps or websites that exist now

title: Heavy rain continues to pound Ernakulam
content: Three houses fully damaged‚Äî one each in Kanayannur, Kochi and Kothamangalam taluks; waterlogging hits usual trouble spots within Corporation limits; bylanes in Thoppumpady, Palluruthy, Kannamaly, and Edakochi reported flooding

title: Amit Shah arrives in J&K to review security situation, plans for Amarnath Yatra
content: Union Home Minister will meet border residents affected by Pakistan shelling; parties hopeful of financial package

title: Murmu inaugurates two-day literary conference
content: The conference will deliberate on topics such as ‚ÄòFeminist Literature of India: Breaking New Grounds‚Äô; ‚ÄòChange in Literature vs Literature of Change‚Äô; and ‚ÄòNew Directions of Indian Literature in Global Perspective‚Äô

title: MiTran Global to hold two-day online camp for teenagers to impart positivity
content: Final summer edition designed to equip young minds with focused learning strategies through modules on memory techniques and growth mindset; workbook and certificate included.

title: Tamil Nadu government constitutes Seventh State Finance Commission
content: It will review the financial position of various urban and rural local bodies and make appropriate recommendations on the distribution of funds to be provided by the State government

title: Bengal‚Äôs protesting teachers ‚Äòignored by PM and CM‚Äô as one dies of ‚Äòstress‚Äô
content: One of the teachers died of a stroke allegedly caused by stress; he was suffering from an underlying ailment¬†

title: Bangladesh should focus on solving its governance issues: India
content: ‚ÄúAs far as the government there is concerned, the responsibility for law and order and governance issues lies entirely with that government,‚Äù Ministry of External Affairs spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal said.

title: Lok Sabha Speaker to lead delegation to BRICS inter-parliamentary forum
content: Speaker Om Birla may also hold bilateral meetings with the Presiding Officers of the participating Parliaments on the sidelines of the forum, the Lok Sabha Secretariat said

title: GRSE begins construction of 13 hybrid ferries for Hooghly river service
content: Vessels with battery-diesel propulsion to enhance green mobility across Kolkata Metropolitan Area; part of State‚Äôs clean transport push

title: Ranking every treble-winning team: Can PSG join Bar√ßa, Bayern, City, United on list?
content: Paris Saint-Germain will face inter Milan in the 2024-25 champions league final this weekend . the french side are in indomitable form and on the cusp of a domestic and European clean sweep . if they beat inter in Munich, they will become only the ninth club in the history of men's football to achieve a European treble .

title: Player survey: Who's the most underrated prospect in this class?
content: college basketball insider Jeff Borzello joined draft analysts Jeremy Woo and Jonathan Givony at the draft combine in Chicago earlier this month . a small handful received multiple votes, some were named by college teammates, some made the case for themselves and others insisted players featured in ESPN's latest mock draft were still underrated .

title: Free agency and draft plans for Stars, Hurricanes, every other eliminated team
content: the 2024-25 NHL regular season is over and the playoffs are underway . a breakdown of the biggest keys this offseason and realistic expectations for next season . more teams will be added to this story as they are eliminated .

title: The five most astounding stats behind the 100-game stretch when the Tigers have ruled MLB
content: the Detroit Tigers were 55-63, 10 games out of the third wild-card spot . they had dealt starting pitcher Jack Flaherty at the trade deadline . their lineup in a 3-1 loss to the San Francisco Giants featured Akil Baddoo batting leadoff (hitting .125), Gio Urshela at cleanup (.605 OPS) and Bligh Madris playing first base .

title: NHL free agency big board: Where does Marner land? Who are the other top options?
content: the salary cap is projected to rise to $95.5 million next season . it could lead to more teams comfortably retaining their own players on expiring contracts . the unrestricted free agent field is organized into different tiers .

title: 2026 recruiting class rankings: Notre Dame pushes closer to the top spot
content: Notre Dame has pushed its way into the no. 2 slot of our 2026 class rankings . the Fighting Illini shook off the loss of ESPN 300 CB Victor Singleton quite well . Nasir Rankin , a top-10 athlete in the ESPN 300, is an early in-state priority .

title: Valkyries coach Natalie Nakase making history in the WNBA
content: the WNBA's first expansion team in 17 years, the Golden State Valkyries made their own mark in the history books . at just over 5-foot-1, she is not the prototypical basketball player or coach . she began her career as a walk-on guard at UCLA, eventually earning the starting job her junior year and becoming team captain .

title: MAC preview: Ohio will need to fend off Toledo, Buffalo as it looks for repeat
content: a big tent can produce occasionally incredible things . the idea of a so-called "super league" continues to waft around . in the past 25 seasons, MAC teams have scored 78 wins over power-conference teams .

title: Pakistani intruder nabbed by BSF in Punjab's Pathankot
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .
